form.aboutDescription: Your Medical Portal (YMP) is your trusted partner in connecting you with top-tier healthcare providers in Turkey. With years of experience, we are committed to delivering high-quality, transparent, and affordable medical services worldwide, empowering you to achieve better health and a brighter future.
form.requestQuote: Fill out the form below for a complimentary consultation
form.name: Full Name
form.messagePlaceholder: How can we assist you? Feel free to share your needs!

thankYou.title: Thank You!
thankYou.message: We appreciate your inquiry. Our team will contact you shortly.

Treatment.SuccessfullyAddedYourTreatment:
Successfully added your treatment request

A medical treatment form has been sent to your email, please fill the treatment request form to complete the process and allow 3 business days to process and provide feedback to your request.

We wish you and your loved ones a speedy recovery.
